title: Ketu Transit in the 1st House for Cancer Ascendant
summary: Ketu transiting your first house creates a phase of detachment from identity, ego, and external validation. You may feel less interested in self-promotion and more drawn toward inner clarity and simplicity. Confidence turns inward, sometimes appearing as withdrawal or emotional distance to others. This transit dissolves outdated self-images and pushes you to understand who you are beyond roles and labels. When accepted consciously, it supports deep self-awareness and inner stability.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Detachment from ego and self-image increases.
Identity feels fluid and less defined.
Interest in simplicity and inward focus grows.

sections.heading: Career
points: Preference for meaningful over visible work.
Independent or background roles suit better.

sections.heading: Relationships
points: Others may find you less expressive.

closing: Ketu in the 1st house strips false identity. What remains is a quieter, more authentic version of you.
